subject: [Lab 06] Q1: Make Adder Increasing
content:
Q1: Make Adder Increasing

Please post all questions you have below concerning Q1: Make Adder Increasing in the follow-ups.

If you are stuck on this question, feel free to read through the follow-up responses to see if you can draw any ideas from them.

threads.question: I was wondering If I could skip this lab since I have submitted 5 labs and 5 discussion , I will not get points for this lab right?(only they are midterm backup points). is that right?  Thank you!

follow-ups.feedback: You are correct about the policy though we highly encourage you to still complete the lab as doing so will help you learn the material for the course
